full_text: Case 22-1426, Document 78, 06/29/2023, 3536039, Page81 of 217 SA-335 Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 204-3 Filed 04/16/21 Page 335 of 348 By signing this agreement, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. additional_notes: The document appears to be a Non-Prosecution Agreement signed by Jeffrey Epstein. The document is mostly printed, with some handwritten dates and signatures. There are no visible stamps or redactions.
